nodes.text: Franklin Scott, also known as "Shorty," was a Human male who was the friend of Geordi Hans. Scott, Hans, Jeff Pill, and A-B6 were in the swoop gang called the Farns in Mos Eisley. Of their "swoop gang", Scott was the only one who owned a vehicle, a Starhawk speeder bike rather than a swoop. Scott once sent A-B6 to Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina to get a hydrospanner, resulting in an altercation with an angry Gamorrean.
